    static final TransactionOption<ItemStack>
    TransactionOption.ALL
    Place as much as the item as possible.
    static final TransactionOption<Boolean>
    TransactionOption.ALL_OR_NOTHING
    Only place the item if can be fully added.
    static final TransactionOption<Boolean>
    TransactionOption.DRY_RUN
    Loop through the inventory items without changing anything.
